text: 16:23-24 Aposel 19:29; 1 Korin 1:14; 2 Timoti 4:20Ezɨ Gaius uan akam isa, ia bagha anemaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ. Kɨ Pol kɨ Gaiusɨn dɨpenimɨn aven itima, a bar deragha na gami. Ezɨ Siosɨn mam uaghan Gaiusɨn dɨpenimɨn aven uari akufi. Ezɨ Erastus nguibar kamɨn Gavmanɨn dagɨabar garir gumazim, ko en mav Kuartus, aning uan akam isa ia bagha anemadi.16:23-24 Fofozir gumazir maba uaghan ghaze, akar otevir mam uaghan vezɨn kamɨn iti. Akar kam kamakɨn. En Ekiam Krais Iesusɨn apangkuvim zurazurara ia ko ikɨ. Guizbangɨra.
